school.name: Moscow Institute of Electronics and Mathematics (Technical University)
Russian Presidential Academy of National Economy and Public Administration

profile_positions.description:
Project: Pega SFA
Team: 11 people (including 3 analysts, 6 developers and 2 testers).
• Development of technical specifications, technical and operational documentation.
• Testing of works performed and demonstration of the results to customers.
• Integration with other systems within the project.
Within the project the following works were performed:
• Сlient requests module has been improved
• Graphical presentations and reports had been created
• Client assign module has been improved
Results:
• Users spend less time with one request
• A large amount of data is in visual form, which reduces the user's time for collecting information and analysis
• The number of clients without managers has decreased, most of the process has been automated

Project: Master Data Management
Team: 11 people (including 3 analysts, 5 developers and 3 testers).
• Identification and formation of needs and demands of the customer.
• Collection of information, description and modeling of business processes.
• Participation in the preparation of presentations.
• Development of technical specifications, technical and operational documentation.
• Testing of works performed and demonstration of the results to customers.
• Integration with other systems within the project.
Within the project the following works were performed:
• Improved data exchange with systems
• Connected new systems sources and systems consumers
Results:
• Consumers of information were able to receive more reliable and relevant information and in the presentation they needed
profile_positions.title: Senior System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Project: Creation and completion of the module for accounting of remuneration to agents
Team: 7 people (including 3 developers and 3 testers).
•	Formation of requirements for the system being developed.
•	Collection and analysis of information in the database.
•	Participation in integration projects.
•	Testing and demonstrating to customers the result.
Within the project the following works were performed:
•	Implemented functional optimizing the work of users.
•	The system of data exchange with external systems was revised and changed.
•	The integration project was implemented.
Results:
•	Increased the speed of processing and payment of remuneration to agents.
•	The number of payments contested by agents decreased.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Project: Creation of a website and online store for Russia and Germany.
Team: 10 people (4 developers, 3 testers)
•	Identification and formation of needs and demands of the customer.
•	Collection of information, description and modeling of business processes.
•	Participation in the preparation of presentations.
•	Development of technical specifications, technical and operational documentation.
•	Testing of works performed and demonstration of the results to customers.
Within the project the following works were performed: 
•	Redesign of the site. 
•	Improved and optimized user registration. 
•	Changed and optimized purchase chains for products. 
Results: 
•	The number of orders through the online store increased.
•	Increased the average check amount.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Project: Scanning and recognition of compulsory third party car insurance contracts.
Team: 15 project (3 analysts, 5 developers, 3 testers)
•	Setting up of automated systems, integrated solutions, maintenance of software, management of changes.
•	Analysis and elimination of incidents of supported systems.
•	Communication with suppliers and development team members.
•	Development of test scripts.
•	Coordination of the testing, including the preparation of test environments, test data.
•	Planning of testing team work.


The project is fully made and implemented from scratch. 
Results: 
•	Reduced costs of delivery of documents.
•	Reduced time of receipt of compulsory third party car insurance contracts information into the database of the company and the Russian Association of Motor Insurers.
•	Automatization of the process of entering information into the database that allowed to reduce costs of personnel.
profile_positions.title: IT Specialist
